about_the_game:
Planetgore is a roguelite deckbuilding game where you use cards to customize your weapons, empower yourself, and chain them together to wield incredible power against aliens. Choose a hero, each with unique weapons and skills, and try to survive waves of deadly aliens. Select your cards with care before setting out to eliminate the alien threats. Experiment with various strategies by combining different types of cards.

Hundreds of cards for building your decks


Find secrets crystals to unlock new skills, gain experience, upgrade your characters and buy new cards.



Explore the planet, find ancient ruins, strange trees, weird rocks, and stranded ships, along with other secrets.

How to Play

Create your deck
Before diving into the action, create your deck. Study the effects of each card to combine them into winning decks.

Delve into action
Choose your weapon and start eliminating aliens! Collect experience and level up. With each level-up, you'll select a card drawn from your deck.
Note: pay attention to card requirements. The effect will not be applied if the requirements are not met.
Everything is a resource: your lives, the number of enemies defeated, money collected, and crystals gathered. All of these can be utilized by cards for their effects.

Upgrade
Collect money to purchase packets where you can find new cards. Incorporate them into your deck to become even more powerful for the next round.
Gather crystals to unlock new features and abilities.
Spend skill points on your heroes to upgrade them and unveil new weapons.

Catalog aliens, unlock characters, find secrets
Don't stop here! Catalog aliens by defeating them, unlock new characters by uncovering secrets on the map, and much more!

Features

  • 320+ cards to use for making your unique decks
  • 4 types of cards: Action, Equip, Powerup and Weapon
  • The game uses its own deck against you to change the enviroment or inflict curses on you
  • 4 characters each with unique weapons and skills to upgrade
  • A dynamic map with procedural elements and events triggered by game deck
  • 13+ weapons (laser, turrets, mines, grenades and more)
  • 19+ hostile aliens with large and golden variations
  • Auto-firing with manual aiming option
  • Fast runs of about 10-15 minutes

short_description: A sci-fi roguelite where, choosing from unique heroes with distinctive skills and weapons, you customize weapons and empower your hero using cards to battle deadly alien waves. Strategize with unique card combinations and brace yourself, as the game also uses a deck against you!
